About Subscription Tracker

Welcome to Subscription Tracker – your free, simple solution to manage all your recurring payments and subscriptions in one place.

Why We Built This

In today's digital world, we all have multiple subscriptions – Netflix, Spotify, Amazon Prime, gym memberships, SaaS tools, and more. It's easy to lose track of what you're paying for and when payments are due. We created Subscription Tracker to solve this problem.

Key Features

  • Multi-Currency Support – Track subscriptions in INR, USD, EUR, GBP, AUD, and CAD
  • Payment Reminders – Get notified before your next billing date
  • Category Organization – Group subscriptions by Entertainment, Productivity, Health, Education, and more
  • Status Tracking – Monitor active, paused, trial, and cancelled subscriptions
  • Payment History – Keep a record of all your past payments
  • CSV Export – Download your subscription data anytime
  • Quick Add Widget – Add new subscriptions instantly with a floating button
  • Trial Period Monitoring – See countdown timers for trial subscriptions
  • Secure & Private – Your data is stored securely with Firebase authentication

Who Is This For?

Subscription Tracker is perfect for:

  • Individuals managing personal subscriptions
  • Freelancers tracking business tools and software
  • Families monitoring entertainment and utility bills
  • Anyone who wants to reduce unnecessary expenses

Our Mission

We believe in financial transparency and control. Our mission is to help you:

  • Never miss a payment deadline
  • Identify unused or forgotten subscriptions
  • Save money by cancelling unnecessary services
  • Gain complete visibility of your recurring expenses

100% Free

Subscription Tracker is completely free to use. No hidden fees, no premium tiers, no credit card required. We built this tool to help people, not to profit from them.
